description.0: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

0.0: Increases all DMG by <cryo>8%</cryo>. After using an Elemental Burst, a vacuum blade that does <cryo>80%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path will be created when Normal or Charged Attacks hit. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

1.0: Increases all DMG by <cryo>10%</cryo>. After using an Elemental Burst, a vacuum blade that does <cryo>100%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path will be created when Normal or Charged Attacks hit. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

2.0: Increases all DMG by <cryo>12%</cryo>. After using an Elemental Burst, a vacuum blade that does <cryo>120%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path will be created when Normal or Charged Attacks hit. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

3.0: Increases all DMG by <cryo>14%</cryo>. After using an Elemental Burst, a vacuum blade that does <cryo>140%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path will be created when Normal or Charged Attacks hit. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

4.0: Increases all DMG by <cryo>16%</cryo>. After using an Elemental Burst, a vacuum blade that does <cryo>160%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path will be created when Normal or Charged Attacks hit. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.
